author: Anthony Spadafora
title: Zoom takes steps to prevent 'Zoom-bombing'
description: Zoom has implemented a number of new changes to help make its video meetings more secure.
content: Zoom Video Communications has seen a surge in new users as a result of people working from home and trying to stay connected during the global pandemic. However, hackers and pranksters have begun to disrupt meetings by joining them without permission through … [+1821 chars]
